response.overview: When my best friend from college persuaded an old friend who hadn't seen each other for a long time to go on a trip.  During the trip, there was a relationship that was difficult to explain. But when I arrived at the accommodation, it was full. Causing both of them to sleep in the same room The more the relationship of the couple is stronger.  Each person began to open up to talk about both the past and the heartbreaking events. There was a pressing event that made the couple to be close to each other, causing the feeling between them to be called friends. But it will be called a boyfriend, it's still not. Friends therefore teased them that they were "booming" together. Many busy stories gradually happened...
response.title: More Than Friends
